text: "(You Want to) Make a Memory" is a song by American rock band Bon Jovi, from their tenth studio album, Lost Highway (2007). ==Music video== It premiered on CMT on May 3, 2007. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of May 24, 2007. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: (You Want to) Make a Memory
